column4: i want to download wine, skype... but the download rate very slow.... 3kB/s only... i'm using add/remove application... is there other way to pause/resume the download?
is there a software like getright in windows... it split a file into smaller files to download simultaneously .... ?
does ubuntu have a software like getright for windows... it split a file into smaller files to download simultaneously .... ? this would speed up the download?
